message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would really benefit you and I'm willing to part with it for $14,500.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $13,000 is a fair offer, the value of this product is truly  higher. I'm willing to come down to $13,800. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you at $13,500, and that's my final offer.
